TopicTitle: [1.1.2] K2 Command Pod: Two Kerbal stock-alike pod (v1.4)

Articles.Content: Excellent capsule! This is now one of my default mods. Thank you

Like the concept and stats. Not at all a fan of the "pinstripe suit" look though . Not very stock-like appearance in my eyes. Otherwise, keep up the good work!.

Yeah have to say, love this idea, will probably use it, but would prefer, maybe alternate, solid~ish color like the other two command pods, less strip~ish~ness.

Edit: And downloaded.

Edited January 4, 2015 by vardicd

it's a really nice pod, but I can't imagine how two kerbals could fit into it.

I can't imagine how any kerbal fits into any pod, look at the size of the hatches and then the size of kerbal helmets.

I can't imagine how any kerbal fits into any pod, look at the size of the hatches and then the size of kerbal helmets.

Kerbal helmets are non-rigid squishy? like air balls?
Wow! Nice job! Perfect niche fit.

Used this capsule on a rescue mission to recover a kerbal stuck in orbit (Seriously, how do they do that?), before the game crashed and killed Jeb (restarting my career save:(). Perfect ship for the Job, especially since I use RT2.
Loving the looks of this pod! She'll get a permanent place in my livery once the IVA is complete. Excellent work!
Love this mod. Best 2-kerbal capsule.
This is another mod that needs to included into the stock game. Love it!
Why were the links removed?
No license in the download, don't worry it shouldn't be for long
He hasn't logged on in 2 weeks.
This is a very useful pod, great work. I would love to see the IVA finished one day. I hope jfjonny5 is just on holidays.
Where are the DL links???????

Where are the DL links???????

Read up 3 posts from yours (#36).
Well i hope this will be uploaded again.
On Kerbalstuff, the mod is listed as having the MIT license.

Yeesh. This was never meant to go on so long.

As you may have noticed, jfjohnny5 hasn't been on the forums since those links were removed. Fortunately, the licensing and particular Add-on Posting Rule issue mean that I can reupload a fixed version:

Here you go.

The add-on content is unchanged from jfjohnny5's version 1.1.

Author: jfjohnny5

Repackaging: Master Tao

License: MIT (text included in download)

Man I hope he's back soon to finish the IVA, I want it so bad... Love this pod.

Me, too.

I love this pod! It needs it's IVA.

jfjohnny5, thank you. Thank you so much for this mod. I think sometimes we underestimate how incredibly awesome this command pod is, because it stops things like this from happening:

Rather, we can just send in the K2 to rescue floating Kerbonauts, and we get beautiful scenes like this:

where are the download links????? I am sure I will get a just someone telling me to read the 60000 posts. Please just put the links where they belong - in the first post.

So... This is dead now? Shame, this was going to be such a good mod

It is such a great concept.
